Simulate a cross-sectional serosurvey with noise

Source: R/sim_pop_data.R
sim.cs.Rd

sim.cs() was renamed to sim_pop_data() to create a more consistent API.

Usage

sim.cs(n.smpl, age.rng, n.mc, renew.params, add.noise, ...)
